auth.login_description: Login via your E-mail address, LinkedIn or Google account.
auth.register_description: Create a new account by filling the following details.
auth.reset_password_link_sent: Reset password link has been sent to your mail

settings.title: Profile Settings
settings.description: Manage your profile and account settings
settings.update_pass_description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure
settings.preferences_description: Customize the layout of the application, as you seem it fits better
settings.update_profile_description: Edit the trivial information of your profile and your profile's appearance

auth.successful_registration: Congrats! Your account has been created!
auth.reset_request_successful: Check your mail! A new request to reset your password has been set
auth.update_user_profile_success: Your profile has been updated successfully!

messages.incorrect_login: Incorrect login credentials. Either the given e-mail or password is wrong

errors.unexpected: ERROR: Unexpected error occurred for the given task. If the error persists, please contact your administrator

declarations.personal_details_description: Fill in the necessary private information. Typically, this is the first page of the form
declarations.family_details_description: Add the family members required for the form. You should add the details of your spouse and your non-adult children
declarations.personal_assets_description: Add assets or liabilities that are registered to your account
declarations.spouse_assets_description: Add assets or liabilities that are registered to your spouse's account
declarations.children_assets_description: Add assets or liabilities that are registered to your non-adult children

placeholders.rights_encumbrances: Any rights or obligations in or not in favor of the owner

confirm_dialog.title: Are you sure?
confirm_dialog.delete_description: This action cannot be reverted! Once you proceed with this action the record will be deleted from our system. Keep in mind that any associated records will be deleted as well.

view_dialog.title: View details
view_dialog.description: Please find below a detailed summary of the record's data
